price: 12. (Waxay odhan), "Rabbigayow! Naga feyd cadaabka4, waan rumeynaye".
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: 4. Waxaa loola jeedaa abaartii iyo habaaskii iyo gaajadii lagu salladay kufaaru Quraysh beenintooda Nabiga s.c.w. awgeed.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
